ovdesc.p: This table defines Open Currency Positions that are used in posting when currency conversion is involved. OCP postings are generated by the payment hub. OCP accounts are currency specific. The payment hub picks up the OCP account from the static table based on the currencies involved.

desc.p: Indicates the company ID for which the record is created. identify the Owning Bank.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
This field defines Currency 1 of the currency pair for which OCP account is defined.
Mandatory field. 3 alphanumeric characters.The value links to the field 'CurrencyCode' in PPT.CURRENCY and cannot be the same as field 'Currency2'.
This field defines Currency 2 of the currency pair for which OCP account is defined.
Mandatory field. 3 alphanumeric characters.The value links to the field 'CurrencyCode' in PPT.CURRENCY and cannot be the same as field 'Currency1'.
